item.description:
For our December meeting program, we are going to change it up a little bit.  You may have heard of a phenomenon called "Speed Dating" where you quickly move through a room and have a very short time to introduce yourself and see if sparks fly.  At the WBOA, we are going to engage in "Speed Networking" where you will be able to share your elevator speech with lots of ladies in a short period of time. This program requires you to have 2 things prepared for the meeting:
 
     •    lots of business cards
     •   a really good elevator speech
 
In addition, December brings us to our annual gift swap.  We will have a Yankee Swap, and we would like you to find something fun and new around your house that is really lovely, but that you are not in love with.  Wrap it up prettily, bring it to the Yankee Pedlar, and during our swap, it will find its way into someone else's home.  Please do not go out and buy something; the spirit of the swap is to pass on to a sister, something that just isn't "you".
item.name: December Breakfast Meeting- Speed Networking
